taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Greek anemone, the windflower, and opsis, appearance]

references.reference: Holm, T. 1905. Anemiopsis [sic] californica (Nutt.) H. and A. An anatomical study. Amer. J. Sci., ser. 4, 19: 76-82.
Kelso, L. 1932. A note on Anemopsis californica. Amer. Midl. Naturalist 13: 110-113.
Nozeran, R. 1955. Contribution à l'étude de quelques structures florales. (Essai de morphologie florale comparée). Ann. Sci. Nat., Bot., sér. 11, 16: 1-224.
Quibell, C. H. 1941. Floral anatomy and morphology of Anemopsis californica. Bot. Gaz. 102: 749-758.
